code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function NewArrivals(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://serene-essence-backend.onrender.com/products").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{const sorted=[...data].sort((a,b)=>b.id-a.id);setProducts(sorted.slice(0,5));}).catch(err=>console.error("Failed to load new arrivals:",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'60px 24px',backgroundColor:'#e9cfc3'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{textAlign:'center',fontSize:'1.8rem',fontWeight:'600',marginBottom:'40px',fontFamily:"'Playfair Display', serif",color:'#5e473a'},children:"New Arrivals: Crafted for Quiet Luxury"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'grid',gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(220px, 1fr))',gap:'30px',maxWidth:'1400px',margin:'0 auto',fontFamily:"'Playfair Display', serif"},children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/product/${product.id}`,style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'#3e2c29',border:'1px solid #e9d6cb',borderRadius:'18px',backgroundColor:'rgb(241 229 223)',padding:'20px',boxShadow:'0 6px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)',textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name,style:{width:'100%',height:'220px',objectFit:'cover',borderRadius:'14px',marginBottom:'12px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{style:{margin:'10px 0 6px',fontSize:'1.1rem',color:'#7d4f40'},children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontSize:'0.95rem',color:'#a58a79'},children:["\u20B9",product.price]})]},product.id))})]});}
